revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Wela Volcano Park |image = [[File:Wela Volcano Park.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Wela Volcano Park. |tokens = 900,000 |location = West of Route 7. }}
<!--T:2--> '''Wela Volcano Park''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. The [[Gyms#Alola|Firium-Z]] [[File:FiriumZ.png|30px]] is awarded upon clearing this dungeon. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 12,896,392 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Cubone.png|40px]] Cubone || rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Sightseer (female).png|40px]] Sightseer Mariah || rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Meowth.png|40px]] Meowth |- | [[File:Kangaskhan.png|40px]] Kangaskhan |- | [[File:Magmar.png|40px]] Magmar || rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Ace Trainer (male).png|40px]] Ace Trainer Jim || rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Noibat.png|40px]] Noibat, [[File:Kadabra.png|40px]] Kadabra |- | [[File:Magby.png|40px]] Magby |- | [[File:Fletchling.png|40px]] Fletchling || rowspan=3|<center>[[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Calhoun || rowspan=3|<center>[[File:Roggenrola.png|40px]] Roggenrola |- | [[File:Salandit.png|40px]] Salandit |- | [[File:Nihilego.png|40px]] '''Nihilego*''' |- |}
<!--T:6--> '''*Note:''' Must be unlocked by doing [[Quests#Ultra Beast Hunt|Ultra Beast Hunt]] Quest first.
<!--T:7--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Alolan Marowak.png|50px]] Alolan Marowak || rowspan=2|<center>64,881,960 || rowspan=4 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Salazzle.png|50px]] Salazzle |- | [[File:Totem Marowak.png|50px]] '''Totem Marowak*''' || rowspan=2|<center>82,543,791 |- | [[File:Totem Salazzle.png|50px]] '''Totem Salazzle*''' |- |}
<!--T:8--> '''*Must be Alola Champion to Unlock'''
